html: Auto play Auto play Read by myself Read by myself

layers.text: It's Purple's birthday today and I love birthday cake, especially with nuts," smiled Squirty as he chatted with Zing. Zing was busy making a birthday card for Purple. "Did you hear what happened to Biggy?" asked Squirty.

html: It's Purple's birthday today and I love birthday cake, especially with nuts," smiled Squirty as he chatted with Zing. Zing was busy making a birthday card for Purple. "Did you hear what happened to Biggy?" asked Squirty.

layers.text:
"Yes I hh-heard, he tripped over a log in the ww-woods and broke his ankle," replied Zing. "He was collecting honey to bring as a gift for Purple."

"But now he's got a big white cast on his right foot and can't walk. Says, he's pretty upset that he won't be able to come to Purple's party," explained Squirty.

html:
"Yes I hh-heard, he tripped over a log in the ww-woods and broke his ankle," replied Zing. "He was collecting honey to bring as a gift for Purple."

"But now he's got a big white cast on his right foot and can't walk. Says, he's pretty upset that he won't be able to come to Purple's party," explained Squirty.

layers.text:
At Purple's house, Purple's mom was busy decorating his birthday cake."Can't wait for my friends to come to my party," said Purple. "Thank you Mama, it was a good suggestion to have it by the pond so my friend Fella could join us, too."
Zing came to the door. "Hey! Purple, th-there's a problem. Biggy gg-got hurt and can't come to your birthday party."

html:
At Purple's house, Purple's mom was busy decorating his birthday cake."Can't wait for my friends to come to my party," said Purple. "Thank you Mama, it was a good suggestion to have it by the pond so my friend Fella could join us, too."
Zing came to the door. "Hey! Purple, th-there's a problem. Biggy gg-got hurt and can't come to your birthday party."

layers.text:
"Hmm, why don't we go over and help him. Maybe, we could carry him to the pond for the party." Zing looked puzzled, "Do you really th-think the tt-two of us could lift Biggy? I mean, hh-he is really big!"
"We could at least try," said Purple. Zing and Purple walked over to Biggy's place and knocked on the door.

html:
"Hmm, why don't we go over and help him. Maybe, we could carry him to the pond for the party." Zing looked puzzled, "Do you really th-think the tt-two of us could lift Biggy? I mean, hh-he is really big!"
"We could at least try," said Purple. Zing and Purple walked over to Biggy's place and knocked on the door.

layers.text:
"Come in," called Biggy as he sat on a chair with his broken foot was resting on a foot stool piled with some pillows.
"We have come to take you with us Biggy," said Purple, "Both of us will lift you by your chair."

html:
"Come in," called Biggy as he sat on a chair with his broken foot was resting on a foot stool piled with some pillows.
"We have come to take you with us Biggy," said Purple, "Both of us will lift you by your chair."

layers.text: "Hey, guys, thanks for coming over. I sure don't want to miss your birthday party or the cake," said Biggy licking his lips. "Thanks for offering to carry me over to the pond."

html: "Hey, guys, thanks for coming over. I sure don't want to miss your birthday party or the cake," said Biggy licking his lips. "Thanks for offering to carry me over to the pond."

layers.text: Zing and Purple bent down to lift Biggy but couldn't move him an inch. "Ouch," cried Zing. "I cc-can't lift you." "Me either. You are just too heavy, Biggy," said Purple.

html: Zing and Purple bent down to lift Biggy but couldn't move him an inch. "Ouch," cried Zing. "I cc-can't lift you." "Me either. You are just too heavy, Biggy," said Purple.

layers.text:
"I understand. I guess I'll just have to stay home and miss the party," Biggy said with the loud sigh.
"Well! That's sad," sighed Purple and soon he left with Zing for the pond.

html:
"I understand. I guess I'll just have to stay home and miss the party," Biggy said with the loud sigh.
"Well! That's sad," sighed Purple and soon he left with Zing for the pond.

layers.text:
Melody, Roxy, Squirty and Walter had already arrived, each had donned colorful party hats.
"Say, where's Biggy?" asked Roxy.
"We tried to bring him over to the party, but he's just too heavy. We couldn't lift him," replied Purple.

html:
Melody, Roxy, Squirty and Walter had already arrived, each had donned colorful party hats.
"Say, where's Biggy?" asked Roxy.
"We tried to bring him over to the party, but he's just too heavy. We couldn't lift him," replied Purple.

layers.text:
"But what's a party without all my best friends?" said Purple.
"So you have an idea?" asked Melody.
Purple smiled as he shared his plan with all.

html:
"But what's a party without all my best friends?" said Purple.
"So you have an idea?" asked Melody.
Purple smiled as he shared his plan with all.

layers.text: A little while later, a line of friends wearing colorful party hats walked towards Biggy's house. Zing carried the cake, Squirty had the box of ice creams. Freddy carried the decorations and Roxy's long back was carefully loaded with the party supplies.

html: A little while later, a line of friends wearing colorful party hats walked towards Biggy's house. Zing carried the cake, Squirty had the box of ice creams. Freddy carried the decorations and Roxy's long back was carefully loaded with the party supplies.

layers.text:
Melody carried an extra party hat for Biggy, while Purple happily carried his dear friend Fella in a big fish bowl. He just didn't want anyone to miss out.
The friends soon reached Biggy's house.

html:
Melody carried an extra party hat for Biggy, while Purple happily carried his dear friend Fella in a big fish bowl. He just didn't want anyone to miss out.
The friends soon reached Biggy's house.

layers.text:
"Hey! Biggy, since you couldn't come for my birthday party, I thought we would bring the party to you!" said Purple. "My birthday party wouldn't be fun without ALL my best friends."
Biggy was amazed as everybody entered the room carrying the decorations and food to celebrate Purple's birthday.

html:
"Hey! Biggy, since you couldn't come for my birthday party, I thought we would bring the party to you!" said Purple. "My birthday party wouldn't be fun without ALL my best friends."
Biggy was amazed as everybody entered the room carrying the decorations and food to celebrate Purple's birthday.

layers.text: "Hey Biggy! This was all Purple's idea," said Melody as she placed the party hat on Biggy's big head.

html: "Hey Biggy! This was all Purple's idea," said Melody as she placed the party hat on Biggy's big head.

layers.text:
"Happy Birthday Purple," chanted the friends as Zing presented the birthday card to Purple.
"I really appreciate your efforts for bringing the party here," said Biggy, "But I'm sorry Purple I couldn't collect any honey to gift you."
"Friends are the very best gifts one can have," smiled Purple.

html:
"Happy Birthday Purple," chanted the friends as Zing presented the birthday card to Purple.
"I really appreciate your efforts for bringing the party here," said Biggy, "But I'm sorry Purple I couldn't collect any honey to gift you."
"Friends are the very best gifts one can have," smiled Purple.

layers.text:
By now Biggy was eyeing the cake. "I can almost feel my large tummy growling for all the yummy goodies," Biggy said smilingly.
Everyone had a good laugh as Purple's birthday party had just begun.

html:
By now Biggy was eyeing the cake. "I can almost feel my large tummy growling for all the yummy goodies," Biggy said smilingly.
Everyone had a good laugh as Purple's birthday party had just begun.
